content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown) and Furnace 1 (position unknown)
- Burner mining drill (position unknown) and Furnace 2 (position unknown)

*Note: The exact positions of the entities are not available due to stale entity data.*

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to stale entity data
- Ensure that entity data is refreshed regularly to avoid stale data issues. This will help in accurately tracking and managing the positions and statuses of entities on the map.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
